column4: I god a strange report from my screensaver. Every time i load it i got this report: starting KTTSD failed. How to solve it? Please help
how can i do compiz on in kubuntu>?\
first go into the system settings  Desktop effects and disable that
then sudo apt-get install fusion-icon   then start up compiz with  the command  fusion-icon and that icon should show up in the system tray
